text: 22.25 Apo 16.37 Anɨb agek, nop pakɨnɨg dad amɨl nag tunɨg lɨlak. Pen Pol ne bɨ chɨm kadɨŋ gep bɨawl olap wulep anɨb sɨŋak jak yek anop agak, Chɨn Lom bɨ okok, takaw kɨles chɨn ak tay agup agak? Anɨb agup, Bɨ Lom nɨb olap nop anɨgɨnɨmɨb agup akaŋ agak? Nɨbi yɨp ma kot gɨl pakɨnɨgebɨm ak, tap anɨb ak teplep agup akaŋ agak?
